Package model.entity

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.entity.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Game. A Game has a two attributes and some functions to manage the thread.
Version:
22/5/2021
Author:
Riccardo Giacalone (ricardo.giacalone@students.salle.url.edu), Guillermo Gonzalez (guillermo.g@students.salle.url.edu), Oscar Cubeles (oscar.cubeles@students.salle.url.edu), Goddy Clinton (weriwohmbang.g@students.salle.url.edu)
